::Zardus/Panzertron::

Zardus and Panzertron enter the shuttle, taking off for the Iron
Fist. 
Zardus looks out a window, frowning.

"And how much controll would I have over the Iron Fist?" he asks, 
watching hills pass by.

"As much as me," Panzertron replies, "I will give you the access 
codes. I will be busy with a project inside the ship itself, though, 
so I won't be available to help. Other than that, you've got 
everything."

Zardus nods. "Allright," he says as the shuttle leaves the continent, 
heading for the island with the Iron Fist on it.
